biotools.summary: FLOSS (flexible ordered subset analysis) software package uses input and output files from the MERLIN linkage analysis package (Abecasis et al, 2002) to perform an ordered subset analysis using either nonparametric linkage analysis z-scores or linear allele sharing model LOD scores.

bioschemas.name: FLOSS
bioschemas.summary: FLOSS (flexible ordered subset analysis) software package uses input and output files from the MERLIN linkage analysis package (Abecasis et al, 2002) to perform an ordered subset analysis using either nonparametric linkage analysis z-scores or linear allele sharing model LOD scores.
